TopicTitle: Renaming and change a class of a ship?

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

have two questions, didn't find any answer for that

1.) I've build a space station, but the first module gave the name to that thing. Can I change it?

2.) In the Map and Space Center the whole thing is a capsule not a station Is there any possibility to change that?

Cheers

WeirdCulture

Edited December 26, 2013 by WeirdCulture
if you right click on the root part there should be an option to "Rename Vessel" Voila! Everything you need is right there.
Right click on either a command pod or probe part of the ship will have a rename option. Didn't know about the root part.

Ahh... now I see the problem No command pod at the station. I build it complete passive, with a small reusable "building" vehicle which connects the parts, diconnects and land on kerbin again. No command pod there. Will try to attach one. Thx

EDIT: Wait... there is one... this works! Now how to class that thing as a Space Station?

EDIT2: PEBKAC found that Thanks Guys!

Cheers

WeirdCulture
